thread.title: 2 men burned to death by mob in Mexico for alleged car theft
thread.title_full: 2 men burned to death by mob in Mexico for alleged car theft | News24

author: news24.com
title: 2 men burned to death by mob in Mexico for alleged car theft
text:
Tuxtla Gutierrez - Angry villagers in the southern Mexico state of Chiapas beat and burned to death two men who they accused of trying to steal a car.
A civil defence official who was not authorised to be Quote: d by name said the two men were grabbed by the mob Monday in the town of San Juan Chamula.
They turned them over to local police. But then a crowd seized the men from the local jail, pushed them through the streets, set them in wooden chairs and burned them to death. A leader of the mob was arrested.
Two men were burned to death in the same area in 2013 after they were accused of raping and killing a woman.
